summary: Add helper methods to generate UUIDs within workflows, supporting multiple versions (v4, v7, v8) like `Workflow::uuid()` or version-specific variants. Discussion centers on whether to provide a single generic method or allow users to choose specific UUID versions.
userImpact: Users will have a convenient way to generate UUIDs within workflows without manual UUID library integration.
proposedFix: Implement Workflow::uuid() methods supporting UUID v4, v7, and v8, with decision between single generic method or version-specific methods (uuid4(), uuid7(), uuid8()).
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented and merged, providing UUID generation utilities for workflows.
